name: Gliders
description: The original classic. Produces stable, moving structures called 'gliders'.

name: HighLife
description: Similar to the classic, but with an extra birth rule that creates self-replicating 'replicators'.

name: Corals
description: Forms static, coral-like structures that grow slowly and intricately.

name: Amoeba
description: A chaotic rule that creates shimmering, amoeba-like patterns with a distinct texture.

name: Maze
description: Generates intricate, maze-like corridors that are mostly static.
